function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Incomplete understanding of clinical features, signs, and symptoms of COVID-19","Impact":"Ineffective control and mitigation of the disease","Mitigation":"Provide targeted education and training on clinical features and symptoms of COVID-19","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, webinars, and telemedicine","People":"National team force for COVID-19 control and mitigation","Owner":"Health authorities and educational institutions"},{"Description":"Misinformation and misconceptions about COVID-19 transmission routes","Impact":"Unintentional spread of the disease due to incorrect beliefs about transmission","Mitigation":"Dissemination of accurate information through public health campaigns and media channels","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, educational infographics, and public service announcements","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health organizations and government agencies"},{"Description":"Inconsistent practices for preventing and mitigating COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of transmission and inability to contain the disease","Mitigation":"Establish clear guidelines and protocols for consistent practices, and provide resources for adherence","Technologies":"Mobile health apps for tracking and monitoring, IoT devices for environmental monitoring","People":"General population and healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health organizations and employers"}]}
